ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” . Do you want to continue ?')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Canceled. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction is already approved. Cannot edit this transaction.')
MlsTrans( 'This transaction has been depreciated. Please cancel the Depreciation first' )

MlsTrans( 'vDocType : '&IF(ISNULL({0,27}) OR {0,27} = '','DocType NotFound',{0,27})&' '& 'vDocType? : '&IF(ISNULL({0,37}) OR {0,37} = '','DocType NotFound',{0,37})&' '& 'vDocStats : '&IF(ISNULL({0,17}) OR {0,17} = '','DocStatus NotFound',{0,17})&' '& 'vDocEntry : '&IF(ISNULL({0,11}) OR {0,11} = 0,'DocEntry NotFound',Str({0,11},'10'))&' '& 'vObjType : '&IF(ISNULL({0,19}) OR {0,19} = '','DocType NotFound',{0,19})&' '& 'AllowCancel : '&IF({0,38},'True', 'False') )
MlsTrans('You do not have Rights to Cancel Document')
MlsTrans('Cannot cancel document within approval process')
MlsTrans('Cannot edit document within approval process')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select COUNT(T1.DocEntry),SUM(T1.DocTotal) from oGJI T1 WITH (NOLOCK) where T1.CardName like '%:2%' and (T1.DocStatus = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and (T1.DocDate between ':4' and ':5') and CONVERT(Nvarchar(15), T1.DocNum) like '%'+':1'+'%'

select DocEntry, ObjType,docStatus,canceled,FinncPriod from ogji WITH (NOLOCK) where CardName like '%:2%' and (DocStatus = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') and (DocDate between ':4' and ':5') and CONVERT(Nvarchar(15), DocNum) like '%'+':1'+'%' order by docentry desc
